Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class ScanListener

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.ScanListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ScanListener extends Thread
This class is used to scan the input from the user. The listener has different request options to wait for and has a default ignore request that ignores every single type of input of the user when not requested
